title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Working Memory-Optimized Language Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain chunk-based language learning design principles that account for working memory load
Learners can apply a three-stage cognitive load management technique (information chunking → visualization → feedback loop) in practical settings
Learners can design working memory-friendly language education scenarios through team-based collaboration and produce project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
